amendment.description: To fully fund the level of Border Patrol Agents authorized by the National Intelligence Reform Act of 2004 and as recommended by the 9/11 Commission.

vote.text: Amendment SA 218 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 218 proposed by Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S2827-2829; text: CR S2828) To fully fund the level of Border Patrol Agents authorized by the National Intelligence Reform Act of 2004 and as recommended by the 9/11 Commission.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 218 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 218 proposed by Senator Hutchison.
